instructions: In the Voice Memos list, swipe down to reveal the search field. Tap the search field, enter part or all of the recording name, then tap Search.

Image titled Use Chromecast Step 10 1 Download the Chromecast mobile app in the App Store or Google Play. Open it and connect it to your Chromecast using the setup instructions above. You will need the latest version of the supported app, so update it regularly. Image titled Use Chromecast Step 11 2 Ensure the phone is on the same Wi-Fi network as your Chromecast. Image titled Use Chromecast Step 12 3 Download supported apps onto your device. A list of apps is available at https://www.google.com/intl/en/chrome/devices/chromecast/apps.html Image titled Use Chromecast Step 13 4 Open a supported app. Choose the content you want to stream. Image titled Use Chromecast Step 14 5 Tap the broadcast button. It will turn blue once you are streaming from your device to the TV. [2] Advertisement
